mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rescuers ( uuid, name, status, location, skills_description, skill_tags, task_ids ) VALUES ( #{uuid}, #{name}, 'available', #{location}, #{skillsDescription}, JSON_ARRAY(), JSON_ARRAY() )
mapper.update: INSERT INTO rescuers ( uuid, name, status, location, skills_description, skill_tags, task_ids ) VALUES ( #{uuid}, #{name}, 'available', #{location}, #{skillsDescription}, JSON_ARRAY(), JSON_ARRAY() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name = #{name}, status = 'available', location = #{location}, skills_description = #{skillsDescription}
mapper.select: SELECT uuid, name, status, location, skills_description as skillsDescription, skill_tags as skillTags, task_ids as taskIds FROM rescuers WHERE uuid = #{uuid}
